verses.verse: <S%H6662>Righteous<s%> art Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that I would <S%H7378>plead<s%> [my] <S%H7378>case<s%> with Thee; <S%H389>Indeed<s%> I would <S%H1696>discuss<s%> <S%H4941>matters<s%> of <S%H4941>justice<s%> with Thee: <S%H4069>Why<s%> has the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6743>prospered<s%>? [Why] are <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H898>deal<s%> in <S%H9045>treachery<s%> at <S%H7951>ease<s%>?

Thou hast <S%H5193>planted<s%> them, they have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8327>taken<s%> <S%H8327>root;<s%> They <S%H1980>grow,<s%> they have <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H6213>produced<s%> <S%H6529>fruit.<s%> Thou art <S%H7138>near<s%> to their <S%H6310>lips<s%> But <S%H7350>far<s%> from their <S%H3629>mind.<s%>

But Thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> Thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> me; And Thou dost <S%H974>examine<s%> my heart's [attitude] <S%H854>toward<s%> Thee. <S%H5423>Drag<s%> them <S%H5423>off<s%> like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H2878>slaughter<s%> And <S%H6942>set<s%> them <S%H6942>apart<s%> for a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2028>carnage!<s%>

<S%H4970>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H56>mourn<s%> And the <S%H6212>vegetation<s%> of the <S%H3605>countryside<s%> <S%H7704><s%> to <S%H3001>wither<s%>? For the <S%H9567>wickedness<s%> of those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in it, <S%H929>Animals<s%> and <S%H5775>birds<s%> have been <S%H5595>snatched<s%> <S%H5595>away,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> [men] have <S%H559>said,<s%> "He will not <S%H7200>see<s%> our <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H319>ending.<s%>"

<S%H3588>"If<s%> you have <S%H7323>run<s%> with <S%H7273>footmen<s%> and they have <S%H3811>tired<s%> you out, Then <S%H349>how<s%> can you <S%H2734>compete<s%> with <S%H5483>horses<s%>? If you <S%H982>fall<s%> <S%H982>down<s%> in a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> will you <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H1347>thicket<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>?

"For <S%H1571>even<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> and the <S%H1004>household<s%> of your father, <S%H1>Even<s%> they have <S%H1571>dealt<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with you, <S%H898>Even<s%> they have <S%H1571>cried<s%> <S%H7121>aloud<s%> <S%H4392>after<s%> you. Do not <S%H310>believe<s%> them, <S%H539>although<s%> they may <S%H3588>say<s%> <S%H1696>nice<s%> <S%H9186>things<s%> to you."

"I have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> My <S%H1004>house,<s%> I have <S%H5203>abandoned<s%> My <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H3033>beloved<s%> of My <S%H5315>soul<s%> Into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of her <S%H340>enemies.<s%>

"My <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> to Me Like a <S%H9030>lion<s%> in the <S%H9194>forest;<s%> She has <S%H5414>roared<s%> <S%H6963><s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Me; <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have come to <S%H8130>hate<s%> her.

"Is My <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> like a <S%H6641>speckled<s%> <S%H5861>bird<s%> of <S%H5861>prey<s%> to Me? Are the <S%H5861>birds<s%> of <S%H5861>prey<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side<s%>? <S%H1980>Go,<s%> <S%H622>gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H857>Bring<s%> them to <S%H398>devour!<s%>

<S%H7227>"Many<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> have <S%H7843>ruined<s%> My <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> They have <S%H947>trampled<s%> <S%H947>down<s%> My <S%H2513>field;<s%> They have <S%H5414>made<s%> My <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H2513>field<s%> A <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

"It has been <S%H7760>made<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> <S%H8076>Desolate,<s%> it <S%H56>mourns<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> Me; The <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> has been <S%H8074>made<s%> <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7760>lays<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

"On <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8205>bare<s%> <S%H8205>heights<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H7703>Destroyers<s%> have <S%H935>come,<s%> For a <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H398>devouring<s%> From one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> even to the <S%H7097>other<s%><S%H776>;<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> for <S%H3605>anyone.<s%> <S%H1320><s%>

"They have <S%H2232>sown<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and have <S%H7114>reaped<s%> <S%H6975>thorns,<s%> They have <S%H2470>strained<s%> themselves to <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3276>profit.<s%> But be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of your <S%H8393>harvest<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> of the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H7934>neighbors<s%> who <S%H5060>strike<s%> at the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5157>endowed<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold<s%> I am about to <S%H5428>uproot<s%> them from their <S%H127>land<s%> and will <S%H5428>uproot<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H310>after<s%> I have <S%H5428>uprooted<s%> them, I will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on them; and I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>back,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H776>land.<s%>

"Then it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H518>if<s%> they will <S%H3925>really<s%> <S%H3925>learn<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of My <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by My <S%H8034>name,<s%> 'As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%>' <S%H9201>even<s%> as they <S%H3925>taught<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> then they will be <S%H1129>built<s%> up in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of My <S%H5971>people.<s%>
"But <S%H518>if<s%> they will not <S%H8085>listen,<s%> then I will <S%H5428>uproot<s%> that <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H5428>uproot<s%> and destroy it," <S%H6>declares<s%> the <S%H5002>Lord.<s%>
